name: TennisForTwoRemastered
description:
Game name：TennisForTwoRemastered

Game Type：Sport

Intro : After 64 years, It's back with being remastered. Have fun in the century game 

How to play: Use mouse or finger to drag the Tennis ball. 
When you get the 10 points, you will be the champion

Team : FireCat、Xinsheng、Banana
